terminals.name: Start the server application
terminals.command: cd api && poetry run uvicorn api.main:app

terminals.name: Start the worker application
terminals.command: cd api && poetry run taskiq worker api.broker:broker --fs-discover --tasks-pattern api/jobs/*_jobs.py --workers 1

terminals.name: Run ruff
terminals.description: Ruff is used for linting python code

terminals.name: Run pyright
terminals.description: Pyright is used for type checking python code

terminals.name: Run pytest
terminals.description: Pytest is used for testing python code
